Class CudaDataBufferFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.buffer.factory.CudaDataBufferFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CudaDataBufferFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBufferFactory
    Creates cuda buffers

        Specified by:
        create in interface DataBufferFactory
        Parameters:
        underlyingBuffer - the underlying buffer to get the storage from
        offset - the offset to view the data as
        length - the length of the buffer
        Returns:
